main event: A report from Project Blue Book on a UFO sighting in Shutesbury, Massachusetts on November 13, 1964.
interesting points: The object was described as a brilliant orange disc observed by multiple witnesses., The sighting lasted about 1 minute and involved an object appearing approximately 60 feet in diameter., Witnesses reported that the object hovered for about 15 minutes before accelerating and disappearing., The local police and air force officials were notified but could not identify the object., There were discrepancies in witness descriptions, leading to questions about whether the sightings were of the same object.
witness description: Mrs. Harriet E. Smith and Reverend Hess
